lines.text: Hi, sailor. Your father working today for a change?
No thanks, honey. I just want to see him.
You know, I've seen that girl somewhere before.
She's a very particular friend of the director who's making this picture. He sticks her in every scene he can.
Mother, shh! Somebody might hear you.

[seeing his wife appear unexpectedly as he is kissing another woman]
My wife! Stand by to render first aid!
This is a factual and authentic document based on actual conditions existing in the world today. It is admittedly propaganda. It is a picture with a purpose. Try to find it.
